imag.crawler.crawler

类 Configurable

  • java.lang.Object
    • imag.crawler.crawler.Configurable
  • 直接已知子类:
    Counters, CrawlController, DocIDServer, Frontier, PageFetcher, Parser

    public abstract class Configurable
extends Object
    Several core components of crawler4j extend this class to make them configurable.
    作者:
    Yasser Ganjisaffar
